extendedInfo.description: UNIQUE STATUS BAR WITH TRANSPARENT BACKGROUNDS WITHOUT ROOT!NOW SUPPORT DOWNLOADABLE THEMESCREATE YOUR OWN AND SHARE IT ON GooglePlay: bit.ly/OL8CmkAt last a bar and a custom notification panel to suit the user!And without losing features!Super Status Bar is the notification bar you always wanted.Not a Root? because there is no problem, Super Status Bar is here to change things!Customize your taskbar to the smallest detail!With Super Status Bar can change the position of the icons in the status bar, you can change your appearance, use the backgrounds that you like, download new themes each week, change the text fonts, simplify your status bar to a minimum expression or extend it until the unimaginable features, all to make your status bar to your liking and not liking the manufacturer.Choose from a large number of themes and also ... be the first to test the status bar ICE CREAM SANDWICH!You can see the notifications on the lock screen or even while you play!You only have to activate Accessibility options AndroidNow you can customize the notifications panel!You'll also have quick access to the most important system notifications without having to deploy the notification bar, with direct access included in the application, such as calls, sms's or gmail'sAnd if this were not enough, you can enjoy the new notifications panel which add more features to the classic status bar, things like shortcuts to switch wi-fi, bluetooth, gps, mute and more.Better and more complete than statusbar+ or omega statusbarBuy premium to use themesThis app is in beta, please used the comments to suggest improvements and not rate adversely.If you have a problem used aid included in the app and if you find no solution send me an e-mailATENTION:SDCARD is required to save settings & backgroundNOTE: The logs are read only to send the FC that may cause by the app.I DO NOT PICK UP PRIVATE USER DATA! For premium features buy Super Status Bar Premium using in-app purchase

reviews.title: waste of money :(  samsung galaxy note...
reviews.comment: i got the paid version and i cant even use it  it keep freezing up my phone i have to take the battery oout and put it back in many time  plz.....fix it!!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Shame
reviews.comment: The author appears to have stopped work on this project. I even bought premium in hopes of its improvement. Its been a momth now and nothing so im uninstalling. The date does not update over days of your phone being powered on. It lacks some other features as well id love to habe seen.
reviews.author: Alec Corey

reviews.title: Dissappointed
reviews.comment: Finally got this to install, PAID for premium version and cant even use it. Cant get thru the set up without getting the \" force close\" msg then it goes black and i have no status bar at all. Tried restarting it. Waste of money! Dont buy it
reviews.author: Nikki Grant

reviews.title: Too Complicated, & Doesn\'t Work Very Well!
reviews.comment: This App Sucks! They Make The User Interface To Hard To Figure Out For Non-Techies. And Those Of Us Who Aren\'t Full-On Techies But 1/2 Techies, It\'s Kind\'ve Complicated As Well. Oh\' & The Drop Down Notification Trey\'s Weather Widget Says I\'m In Valencia, Spain When I\'m In Northern California! What\'s Up With That????
reviews.author: Johnny Murillo

reviews.title: Good.
reviews.comment: Can\'t keep it because it slows my phone down too much, but it looks really good. It\'s a pity it uses too much RAM.
reviews.author: Romano DC

reviews.title: Still needs work
reviews.comment: Love the updates but it still needs work I can\'t change do anything on the carrier option nothing saves and I can\'t turn the widget off it keeps turning back on
reviews.author: Carrisa Wells

reviews.title: Nothing like it
reviews.comment: Notifications come expanded so it takes up room, would be better if it could collapse like jelly bean. If it is closed widget must be made again, but it does the job and more.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: \"Come back author come back\" I want this to work :)
reviews.comment: The battery icon disappears on occasion and only returns if you plug it in also some notifications that pop up on your status bar won\'t disappear... I love this app in that I can have the status bar look like part of my background by some cleaver cropping instead of a generic black strip with stock which is the reason I invested in this great app I just want it to be perfect soo much so I can get everyone to get it plz workout some of these issues some how :)
reviews.author: Darren Holland

reviews.comment: Developer listened. Seems as if everything is fixed this app runs smoother. I encourage all to download. I would like the am/pm to be fixed but after all the fixes I can live with a minor glitch. App is awesome!
reviews.author: Tara Blaze

reviews.title: Decent. Needs a few tweeks.
reviews.comment: I dont know what people do to their phones but this runs smooth on my Note 2. Set up was easy and it looks great. Yea it needs a little work but people need to learn to troubleshoot or get an iPhone.
reviews.author: Wilfredo Nieves

reviews.title: Good but Eat RAM (100MB+)
reviews.comment: Good app.. but after time this eat my RAM up to 100MB... have to restart...
reviews.author: Aries Santoso

reviews.title: Works as advertised,  has a few issues!
reviews.comment: This app is pretty good! It does work fine for me on the galaxy s3, but seems to eat up memory and will crash every once in awhile if I run a lot of apps back to back. Seems like it just needs few few more optimizations. Good choice for non-rooted theming!
reviews.author: Demetrius Smith

reviews.title: Its ok
reviews.comment: I like the customizing options with this app however there are a few things that could be fixed.   1. It wont let me have the battery icon and show how much juice is left. Its just a blank icon or it disappears when I choose to show juice   2. I wish you could hit your home button and make the status bar go away.   3. Does not clear notifications, I have to turn off the app and clear everything from the stock status bar 4. I would like to change the toggle colors as well  It is also a bit glitchy and slow
reviews.author: Rebecca Lawson

reviews.title: I like not love it
reviews.comment: I enjoy moving stuff around but i have a weather app that puts thetemp in statusbar i select temp to show but it does not. No missed call notice with the number or email only text notices. I have a vm venture
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good app... but keep on force to close...
reviews.comment: Just wanna ask.. i restarted my phone.. and i purchased the premium ssb... do i have to purchase again or not??
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome concept of a little buggy
reviews.comment: This is a great idea and way to clean up that mess of an Android status bar.    It works as designed, but I find it really sluggish,  especially when opening the notification list.  And I wish there was a way to still have access to the native notifications.   Looking forward to future updates!
reviews.author: Glenn Hessel

reviews.title: SG3
reviews.comment: The only good thing that I can say about this app with the premium version is the pretty themes. It constantly force closes & the notifications don\'t show up. The carriers don\'t show up even when I followed every step. The font wouldn\'t change. It kept removing my widget. Please don\'t waist your money on this. Its a no-refund policy. It doesn\'t tell u that when purchasing it. Make some things better & maybe ill think about using it again.
reviews.author: Dee Dee Miles

reviews.title: Worst $3 ever spent!
reviews.comment: Purchased the premium version. none of the themes ever worked. eventually cause my galaxy s3 to freezing crash so I uninstalled. Want refund but know it\'s never going to come.
reviews.author: vreeland holt

reviews.title: Great customization
reviews.comment: Tons of options but its laggy and no where near as fluid as the stock notification panel....my quad core note 2 should have no issues yet it flickers and doesnt work sometimes when you grab it fast. Will keep my eye on the app.
reviews.author: Patrick Prince

reviews.title: Doesnt Work
reviews.comment: Needs a lot of work still. Icons come and go on there owe. Do not Buy.
reviews.author: John B
